name: LewdQuest
description:
LewdQuest is a semi rhythm-based photography RPG that enables the player to live the dream of becoming a professional erotic photographer after quitting their boring 9-to-5 soulless job.

  • MEET stunning models - Is it getting hot in here, or is it the girls? Answer: it's the girls.
  • ORCHESTRATE elaborate photoshoots - Capture all of their best angles and curves!
  • IMPROVE your equipment - Unlock better cameras to aid you in your newfound career!
  • IMPRESS the ladies - Raise your reputation to the roof and drop their clothes to the floor.
